item.description:
This talk will focus on recognizing and accepting the foolish within our inner life through the dynamic working of Infinite Compassion and Wisdom. Discover how the Shin practice of deep hearing (monpo), and its consequent unfolding of humility and gratitude, can transform us into our inner potential, our buddhaness. Presented by Dojin.

Visit our main website  at www.bffct.net for Calendar and more information on our beliefs and practices.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
